nodes.documentation:
If one or more players are detected cheating, this round will be invalid.
The money will be given back to the players.
nodes.name: detectCheating

nodes.documentation:
Transfer 95% of the temporary gameDeposit to the winner, 5% to the banker.
@dev To cut down the fee, transfer the balance within the contract, rather than directly to winner's address.
nodes.name: balanceTransfer

nodes.documentation: House cleaning process to release resources and prepare for the next round.

params.targetTransactionID: The transaction to reveal the details

checkBalance().return: balance The balance of the msg.sender

checkRegistration().details: Called in the front-end to check if the address hash been registered or not

params.accountToRegister: accountID the user would like to register

currentGameInformation().details: The front-end will show this information in Game Panel
currentGameInformation().return: bet_value Bet value for current roundmax_player Max player allowed for current gamecurrent_player Number of current enrolled players

currentGameStatus().details: The front-end will use this function to determine what is shown in the Game Panel

currentInGamePlayer().details: The front-end will use this function to check if the player have already enrolled in the game

params._maxPlayer: The maximum number of players for this game
params.betValue: Only the player who initialize the game can set the betValue,                the participant can only accept it or wait until the game ends

lastGameHistory().details: The front-end will use this function to render Last Game History Panel
lastGameHistory().return: game_id Game IDof last gamebet_value Bet value of last gametotal_player  Number of players in last gameyour_index Index of the msg.sender in last gamewinner_index Index of the winner in last game

params.randomNumber: the automatically generated randomNumber for the player.

submitHash(bytes32).details: once both players submit their hash values, the allHashSubmitted will be true,     and the player can reveal their clear text.

params.hashValue: each player submit the hash value generated from their clear text.

params.amount: The amount of balance to transfer to the target registered user
params.toAddress: The address of the target registered user to transfer balance to

params.amount: The amount of balance to transfer to the target registered user
params.toAccountID: The accountID of the target registered user to transfer balance to

userTransactionArrayCheck().details: Used in the front-end for further check individual transaction record

params.targetTransactionID: The transaction to reveal the details

userTransactionCheck(uint256).return: _id The transaction ID_type The type of the transaction_time The timestamp of the transaction_from Where the amount of ETH is transferred from_to Where the amount of ETH is transferred to_amount the The amount of ETH being transferred

params.amount: The amount of balance to withdraw.

bankerTransactionCheck(uint256).notice: The banker can read transactions of all users

bankerWithdraw(uint256).notice: Permit the banker to withdraw the balance (commission earnings)

checkIsBanker().notice: Check if the msg.sender is the banker, used in front-end only

checkRegistration().notice: Check if the user have registered or not, if yes, return the accountID

deposit().notice: User deposit the money to the contract, and the contract will give him a "virtual" balance, similar to deposit fiat money to bank

initializeGame(uint256,uint256).notice: Initialize a game a game struct will be initialize and the betValue will be move from player's balance to banker'sonce the game is initialized, the currentWaiting will be true,        and the front-end will not allow user to start a new game, they can only join the current one or wait

joinGame().notice: If there is an on-going game, the user can join it. Once the new player join the game, the betValue will be deducted and transfer to the banker.

latestTransactionID().notice: The banker can know the latest transaction ID

submitClearText(uint256).notice: Function for players to submit their clear text values. Once 2 players submitted the clear text values, teh findWinner process will start.

submitHash(bytes32).notice: Players submit their hash values through this function.

transferToAddress(address,uint256).notice: User transfer his/her deposit to another registered user with the address

transferToID(string,uint256).notice: User transfer his/her deposit to another registered user with the accountID

userTransactionCheck(uint256).notice: Reveal the transactions within 1 day to usersUser can only see the transaction belongs to it

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw the balance from the contract, get the token back to his/her ethureum address
